title: In and Out
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 31 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Cats and dogs leap in and then out of a big mud puddle. Next, cows leap in and out of the mud puddle. Readers will delight in what happens when the final visitors, the pigs, jump into the mud.
meta: cats, cows, dogs, in, mud, out, pigs
Retell story events while reading to understand the text
Identify Character, Setting and Plot : Identify story elements of characters, setting, and plot
Capitalization and Punctuation : Identify when to use capital letters and appropriate ending punctuation in sentences
Antonyms : Identify words that are opposites (antonyms)

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
